name: Flick & Swing vs Red Ball FREE
name_original: Flick & Swing vs Red Ball FREE
description:
Flick & Swing vs Red Ball is amazing new action arcade game and it's almost impossible hard!

WARNING! Highly addicting!!!

Funny little red ball is trying to avoid falling down, try to keep your balance and stay top on the swinging box which is connected with a stick. This game is based on real geometry and 2d physics, this make it’s really fun and addictive game to play. Easy gameplay with easy controls gives you great gaming experience. Simple and colorful graphics makes game looking very clean and beautiful. This game is so hard and rush but it’s so fantastic game test your brain reflex and finger speed. This game is working great on both phones and tablets.

You can only control ball rolling and make this correct time in the correct direction or you easily drop down on the box and falling down to the death. Game may feel little bit a hard at first, but you will stay longer on the box when you get more practice and experience. You will get more and more points when you stay longer time on the box.

This game is so simple, fun and addictive, so this makes you wonder that no one has done this kind of game a long time ago.

Did you need more than 2, 3 or 4 attempts to climb to the top of the hi-scores and also open achievements. Good luck!

[ CONTROL ]
- tap left side screen (roll left)
- tap right side screen (roll right)

[ BASIC RULES ]
- stay on the moving box
- don't fall
- stay happy

[ WHAT YOU GET ]
- easy gameplay (tappy control)
- beautiful clean graphics
- fun and really addicting game
- this game makes you happy
- amazing and same time almost impossible game
- test your brain and finger speed
- real 2d physics and geometry
- lot of crazy falls
- holiday feelings

Challenge your friends now and spend some amazing moments with your buddies, just play and enjoy! So now it's time to roll and stay on the box!
